thread.title: Another batch of Elton shows on sale Sunday
thread.title_full: Another batch of Elton shows on sale Sunday | Las Vegas Review-Journal

author: Mike Weatherford
title: Another batch of Elton shows on sale Sunday
text:
Tickets for 19 more shows of Elton John's "The Million Dollar Piano" go on sale at 10 a.m. Sunday for January and April dates in the Colosseum at Caesars Palace.
The rock and pop legend is here for select Caesars dates through Halloween, and next week marks the 40th anniversary of two concerts at Dodger Stadium which proved him king of the music world.
The 2016 show dates are Jan. 19-20, 22-23, 26-27, 29-31 and April 16-17, 19-20, 22-23, 26-27 and April 29-30.
Tickets are $55 to $250 and available at the Caesars box office, through AXS.com and thecolosseum.com or by calling 702-731-7208.
